channel.title: Publish on Hugo Techdoc Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Publish on Hugo Techdoc Theme

item.title: Learn about the Okta Integration Network
item.description: Learn In Phase 1?: “No, new content can be created at later phase.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, it’s “glue” documentation not related to the product help docs Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc - new content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Validation: Reasons for a “Learn” section include: Internal OIN Workshop results: When asked “What do devs need to know about the OIN” employees answered: Why OIN What’s the value prop What is OIN?

item.title: Plan your app integration
item.description: Plan your app integration In Phase 1?: “No, new content can be created at later phase.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: Maybe. If a help doc already exists, this doc can be a summary redirect to the main help doc page. Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc - new content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: Discuss factors developers need to think about before being successful on the OIN

item.title: Test with a sample app
item.description: Test with a sample app In Phase 1?: “No, new content can be created at later phase.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Group Notes Group description: - Contains sample apps that customers can use to understand the configurations of an OIN app and ways to submit such an app. The sample app can be the basis for the customer’s OIN app if they choose to use it.

item.title: Build your app
item.description: Build your app In Phase 1?: “Yes, since it’s a new doc pulling from existing content” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: This doc provides summaries and links to how to build an SSO app, LCM (SCIM) app, and API Service.

item.title: Prepare for submission
item.description: Prepare for submission In Phase 1?: “Yes, phase 1 version can be a very simple guide hub.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc - new content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Content type: Guide Hub This type of document serves as a central navigational starting point within a larger documentation system. It’s structured to outline various user journeys, guiding users to specific documents through organized links, often presented in a tree view or a similar hierarchical structure.

item.title: Submit
item.description: Submit In Phase 1?: “Yes, phase 1 version can be a very simple guide hub.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, it’s “glue” documentation not related to the product help docs Content Notes New or existing doc?: Existing doc: changes needed Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: This doc is large and covers different types of content such as guide up, submission process, etc.

item.title: Update your app
item.description: Releasing new versions of your app In Phase 1?: “No, new content can be created at later phase.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, it’s “glue” documentation not related to the product help docs Group Notes Group description: Based on the User research we need to determine what the content should be for this section. Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc - new content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer

item.title: Connect for help
item.description: Connect In Phase 1?: “No, new content can be created at later phase.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc - new content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Validation: - Internal workshop: When asked “What prevents developers from being successful on the OIN”, respondents answered: - How to ask for and receive help from OKta - Links to Okta Education classes
